title: Charlie and the Viaduct
features: Historical fiction about true events from the viewpoint of the horse who lived it
description: Valerie White has loved horses for as long as she can remember and has owned horses for many years. She lives in Sharon, Massachusetts, not far from the Canton viaduct.
